title: Hammam Beni Guecha
description: The so-called Hammam Beni Guecha is a ruined Roman spa located just north and east of the modern Algerian village of Chouara Torche (Beni Guecha municipality). The site may be associated with a road station recorded on the Peutinger Map: Fons Carmerata.

properties.description: Site determined with reference to multiple sources listed in references (OSM appears to be incorrect).
properties.title: Imagery Location of Hammam Beni Guecha

properties.description: 1:500,000 scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 9814
